name: Urs Maulai Abdullah Saheb AQ
html:
• Imam Mustansir Billah ( a.s. ) [427-487] na zaman ma aap ye Hindustan ma be ( 2 ) Dai ne HiDAYat vaste mokla: Maulai Abdullah ane Maulai Ahmed.
  • Beve sahebo Gujarat na Khambat mukame muqim thaya. [ 467 H.]
  • Maulai Abdullah ye ghana Jain ane Hindu logo sathe behas kari, Mojeza bataya,1, Sidhpur ane Kauka, Pisawara na Ilaka ma phelai. Aasre 25000 logo ye Dawat ne javab dido.
  • Saghla karta pehla Khambat na Kumbi cast na Kaka Akela, ane Kaki Akela iman laya. {Kuva no mojezo}
  • Te baad Naagar Cast na ghana logo ye javab dido. Patan na Raja Sidhraj Jaisinh ane ehna be vazir Tarmal ane Bharmal ni madad rahi. Ye sahebo ye bhi Dawat no javab dido.
  • Maulai Abdullah 1 Moharramul Haram na din vafat thaya. Aap na mazar Khambat ma chhe. [Urs 16 Moharram manave chhe.]  
  • Aap ye Vazir Bharmal na farzand Maulai Yaqub ne Hind na Vaali banaya. Dawat nu markaz have Patan ma qayam thayu.
  • Maulai Abdullah ni nasal ma Doat ane Hudud Fozalah thaya. Dail Ajal Syedna Qasim Zainuddin [r.a] ( 31 ma dai ) , Maulai Hasanfir bin Ali , ane bija hudud aap ni nasal ma si chhe.
old_name: Urus Mawlai Abdullah Saheb

name: Urs Maulai Raj Bin Maulai Hasan Saheb
html:
• Moulai Hasan (a.q.) bin Moulai Adam (a.q.) na baad Maulai Raj bin Moulai Hasan Shaheed (a.q.), Hind na vaali thaya.
  • Aap nu laqab Shujauddin hatu,1, magar tamne hiDAYat aapva vaste aayo chhun. Aap ye mumin ne samjhavta, hiDAYat deta, ane aap ni aa mehnat na sabab hazaro Mumineen deen taraf pachha vala.
  • Moulai Raj bin Dawood -Soni (a.q.) , ane aap na farzand Shaikh Jafar Saheb (a.q.), aap ni muavin ma rehta.
  • Dushmano ye aap par ghano zulm kido. Aap no maal, ghar ane asbaab saghlu looti lidu. Baytul maal chhini lido. Aap ne qaid kida.
  • 904 H. ma aa fasaad babat Yemen si 20ma Dai, Dail Ajal Syedna Hasan Badruddin (r.a.) no ek kagaz lakhayelo chhe, je ma aap ye Maulai Raj (a.q.) ne ghano hoslo aapo chhe.
  • Aakhir ma Dushmano aap par tuti para ane aap na tukre tukra kari dida. Aap 2 Moharram 925H. na din shaheed thaya. Aap na sabab Haq nu raj baqi chhe.
  • Al Hayyul Muqaddas Syedna Mohammed Burhanuddin Aqa (RA) aksar farmavta ke jo Maulai Raj na hota to apan Mumineen kahan hota? Maula Lukmanji bin Habibullah (a.q.) [ madfoon-Surat], aap ni qabr par Sajdo karta. Huzur-e-Aala (tus) aap ni qabr par sajdo kari ziyarat kare chhe.
old_name: Urus Mawlai Raj Bin Mawlai Hasan Saheb

name: Urs Syedi Khanji Feer Saheb AQ
html:
• Syedi Khanji Feer Saheb A.Q. Syedi Fakhruddin Shaheed A.Q ni nasaal ma si che.
  • Aap ye 34ma Dai Syedna Ismail Bdruddin si 37ma Dai Syedna Noor Mohammed Nooruddin R.A tak 4 doat khidmat kidi chhe.
  • Aap Syedna Ismail Badruddin Saheb R.A ni hazarat ma ilm leva aaya tha. Jahan Dai sabaaq parhavta hata, te jagah na najdeek ghani badbu (foul smell) aavti hati. Syedi Khanji Feer Saheb A.Q khud te jagah ni safai kidi. Dai ne khabar pari tevare gahna khush thaya.
  • ilm ma aaleem tha. ghana olomas ne taiyar kida. Tema Syedi AbdulQadir Hakimuddin A.Q. Syedi Lukmanji bin Habibullah A.Q ane Syedi Hasanji Badshah bhi hata.
  • Aap hamesha awwal waqt ma namaaz vaste masjid ma padharta,1, ane 80 varas ni umare udaipur ma 2nd moharram 1118H. 1706 A.D aap wafat thaya. Aap ni qabr par Aalishan qubbat bana hua che.
  • Aap ni dikri fatema Behen, ane aap na pota ahemdji ni qabr aap na qubbat ma chhe.

name: Urs Syedi Shaikh Feer Jamaluddin AQ bin Mulla Mohammed Ali AQ
html:
• Syedi Sheikh Feer Jamaluddin, (a.q.) na maa saheba [Managori Baisaheba ( Shauhar- Firji bin Jaafar a.q.,1, Syedna Hasan Badruddin saheb r.a. na zaman [ 940 H.] ma aap Dhrangdhra padhara.
  • Ek arsa tak aap vahan rahya, ane 24ma Dai Syedna Yusuf Najmuddin Saheb r.a. na farman si aap Jamnagar padhara. Yahan Mumineen nu vasvanu have shuru thayu. Syedna Yusuf Najmuddin Saheb r.a. ye aap ne halaar [aaj nu Saurashtra] na vaali banaya.
  • Aap aalim tha. Aap nu laqab Jamaluddin thu. Syedna Hasan Badruddin r.a. si Syedna Dawood bin Qutubshah [r.a.] tak 8 Doat ni aap ye khidmat kidi. Syedna Dawood bin Qutubshah [r.a.] ye aap ne Rasul Hudud banaya.
  • Jamnagar ma aap Vali-e-Hind, Maulai Adam ane Maulai Raj na muavin rahya. Jamnagar ma aap nu makan aaj bhi maujud chhe, ane aap na naam si Mohallo aabad chhe. Mohalla ni masjid aap ye banavi chhe. Masjid na minara ajab shaan na chhe.
  • 998H. ma aap Amirul Haj hata. Haj si farig thai, Ahmedabad, Syedna Dawood bin Qutubshah r.a. ni hajrat ma aaya, ane vahan si Jamnagar padhara, ane vahan aap wafat thaya.
  • Aap ni umar 100 varas ni hati.
  • Aap na Qubba Syedna Taher Saifuddin r.a. na zaman ma,1365 H. ma tameer thaya.
old_name: Urs Syedi Shaikh Feer Jamaluddin AQ bin Mulla Mohammed Ali AQ

name: Urs Syedi Mohammed Bin Qazikhan
html:
• Syedna Dawood bin Ajabshah ane Syedna Dawood bin Qutubshah r.a. na Zaman ma Kapadvanj na aamil hata.
  • Bewe Dai aap na haath par varamvar Kapadvanj padhara chhe. Kapadvanj na mumineen ye beve Dai ni ghani khidmat kidi chhe.
  • Aap ikhlas ane safaa na saheb tha. Hamesha Dai ni khidmat ma rehta. Syedi Khoj bin Malek Saheb na aap ustad hata.
  • Gujarat ma Sultan Muzaffar no zaman hato. Mumineen ne ghani takalif hati. Aap ye te duur karva ghani mehnat kidi hati.
  • Aap 6 Moharram vafat thaya che. Aap na Qubba Kapadvanj ma Syedi Khoj bin Malek na roza si aagal jaata aave chhe. baju ma masjid chhe.

Urs Mubarak, Syedna Ibrahim Vajihuddin RA
html:
• Syedna Ibrahim Vajihuddin (r.a.) Bava Mulla Khan Saheb ni nasal ma si chhe.
  • Aap ni viladat 1101 H. ma thai. Aap na Bavaji Syedi Abdulqadar Hakimuddin Saheb a.q. aap ne har safar ma saath raakhta.
  • 21 varas ni umare,1, Syedi Abdulqadar Hakimuddin Saheb a.q. ye aap ne Dai ni hajrat ma mokla. Aap na saath Syedi Lukmanji tha. Mehnat na waqt, aap ye Syedna Kalimuddin (r.a.) ane Syedna Nooruddin (r.a.) ni ghani khidmat kidi.
  • Syedi Abdulqadar Hakimuddin (a.q.) jivare Dawat vaste bija shaher ma padhare to aap ne potani jagah ma muki ne padhare. Aap aap na bavaji saheb na hamshikal ane ham misal tha.
  • 1143 H. ma Ujjain ma qahat [famine] paro. Logo na-ummid thai gaya. Syedna Vajihuddin Saheb Saheb (r.a.) Mumineen ne lai ne Sipra nadi [river] par padhara. Namaz parhi, doa farmavi. Khuda ye aap ni doa ni barkat na sabab barish [rain] nazil kida. Aam logo aaj bhi te zikar kare chhe.
  • 1158 H. ma Gadeere Khum ni majlis ma aap ye aap na farzand Syedna Hebatullah Al Moayyed Fi-ddin (r.a.) par nas farmavi.
  • 1168 H. aap bimar thaya. 68 varas ni umare,17 Moharram ul Haram Aap Ujjain ma vafat thaya.
  • Najmee Mazar-Ujjain ma aap madfoon chhe.

name: Urs Syedi Hasanfeer Shaheed AQ
html:
• Syedi va Moulai Hasanfeer Shahid (A.Q) Moulai Abdullah (Khambat) na pota che.
  • Moulai Hasanfeer Saheb (A.Q) ghana Aalim tha. Ilme nujum,1, ilme ramal vagere tamam ulum ma aap mahir tha.
  • Patan na sultan Muzaffarshah ye aap ne bulaya. Quran shareef ni ek ayat, ke soy na kana ma si unt (camel) kem jay, ehno javab talab kido. Aap ye hikmat se te ayat samjhavi. Sultan ye khush thai ne aap ne Denmal ni jagir aap dedi.
  • Rome na badshah ye "Teen putli" (3 dolls) mokli. Teene ek surkhi (Same). Kai putli ehma afzal, te durbar ma koi samjhavi saku nahi. Aap ye vahan bhi aap na ilmni shaan zaher kidi. Sultan ye aap ni karamat ane izaat kidi. Darbariyo ane mukhalefeen hasad ni aag ma salgi gaya.
  • Sultan Mehmoodshah na zaman ma (23rd Moharram ul-Haram 795H) aap ne Denmal pase [Patan-Gujrat] na najdeek shaheed kida. Aap na gulam ane camel bhi aap na sathe shaheed thaya. Ek popat ye aa khabar pohnchavi. Beve ni qabr aap na Qubba maj che.
  • Aap ni nasal ma Doat kiram ane Hudud Fozola thaya che. 31 ma Dai Syedna Qasim Zainuddin R.A ane Moulai Nooh R.A (Madfoon-Qutbi Mazar, Ahemdabad) aap ni nasal ma si che.
  • Aqa Moula TUS ne aaram vaste aa jagah ghani pasand che, ane aap varamvar yahan padhare che.

name: Urs Mubarak, Syedna Ali Shamsuddin bin Syedna Abdullah RA
html:
• Syedna Ali Shamsuddin Saheb (R.A) ghani chhoti umar ma Ibadat,1, Ilm, Jehad ane Fazal ma kamaal ne pohncha tha.
  • Aap na ayyam mehnat ane imtehan na hata. Aap na Zaman ma Hind ma Jafar ni fitnat shuru thai.
  • Aap Zimarmar ma muqeem thaya, magar Zaidio ye zulm kido, tarah tarah si aap ne sataya, magar aap sabar karta rahya. Aakhare Dawat ni ane Mumineen ni hifajat vaste Zimarmar no qillo sonpi ne aap Hisne Afeda padhara, ane vahan si chhelle aap Haraz padhara. Vahan si aap ye Shibam java no irado kido, jahan aap na farzand Syedna Idris (r.a.) muqeem hata.
  • Aap Shibam vaste nikla. Zamana ye ghano zulm kido tho, Jism ma ghani kamjori aavi gai thi. Aap aap na bhai Izzuddin Maad (a.q.) na saathe Shareqa utra, ane yahan 3 Safarul muzaffar 832 H. ma Khamis na din zawal na waqt aap wafat thaya.
  • Syedna Idris ne aap na wafat ni khabar pohnchi, aap te waqt sakhat barish ane havaa na bavajud Shareqa padhara. Haraz na gamo ma si logo mohti ginti ma aaya. ane ghano matam thayo.
  • Aap ni qabr mubarak Shareqa ma chhe. Aap na jivar ma aap na Mazoone Dawat, Syedi Ali bin Abdullah Shebani (a.q.) ane Mazoone Dawat Syedi Mohammed Asaduddin (a.q.) bin Idris bin Syedna Abdullah (r.a.) ni quboor chhe.
  • Al Hayyul Muqaddas Syedna Mohammed Burhanuddin Aqa (RA) ye aap ni qabr par ghana nafees Qubba banaya chhe, je Rozat Tahera ni mini copy jeve lage chhe. Aap ye 1428 ma iftetah farmayo. Qubba shareef no mahol ghano nafees chhe.

name: Urs Mubarak, Syedna Abduttaiyeb Zakiyuddin RA
html:
• Syedna Abdul Tayeb Zakiyuddin R.A. Daot-e-Badriyeen na chhatha (6th) Dai chhe.
  • Aap ni viladat 1147H. 1734 A.D wankaner ma thai.
  • Aap na bavaji saheb Syedna Badruddin R.A vafat thaya,1, ane aap ye waez kidi. Ane Mumineen na aqaaed na haq na deen par jamavi dida.
  • Syedna Moayyed R.A. na baad aap dawat na arsh par mustawi tahya. Har khamees (thrusDAY) na din aap waez farmavta. Ashura na din Lagan (Rozu) vaste app ghani taqeed farmavta.
  • Fajr ni namaz na baad "Taqarrub" ni doa "Yaseen" ane "innallah" parhvani rasam aap ye jaari kidi. Te siva biji ghani rasam aap ye zinda kidi.
  • Aap 4th Safar-ul-Muzaffar 1200 H . Burhanpur ma vafat thaya chhe.
  • Aap na Qubba aap na farzand 42ma Dai, Syedna Yusuf Najmuddin R.A. ye banaya chhe.

name: Urs Syedi Abdeali Imaduddin bin Shaikh Jeeva bhai AQ
html:
• Syedi Abdeali Emaaduddin A.Q. ye panch (5) doat ni khidmat kidi chhe.
  • Syedna Abdeali Saifuddin R.A saheb ye Syedna Izuddin R.A ane Syedna Zainuddin R.A na saath Syedi Abdeali Emaaduddin ne ilm intekhab kidu. Aap allama-e-zaman chhe. Aap na upar Syedna ni Khaas nazar hati.
  • Syedna Zainuddin R.A ye Syedna Mohammed Badruddin R.A ane Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A ne aap ni taraf sonpa. Aap ye beve sahebo ne taiyar kida. ilm ni amanat ne nakal kidi.
  • Syedi Abdeali Emaaduddin A.Q. ye ghani madeh likhi chhe. Arabi,1, "Lubbul Lubaab" , aap na ala'a kitab chhe.
  • Aap ye 47ma dai Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A ni 15yrs khidmat kidi. Aap ne Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A ye Mukasir na rutba ma qayem kida.
  • Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A jivare Haj par padhara, te waqt aap par nas kari ne padhara.
  • Te arsa ma Syedi Abdeali Emaaduddin A.Q. ye ek puri waez "Bismillah" ni maani par kidi, je bayan ghanu shaan nu hatu.
  • 48ma Dai, Syedna Husamuddin R.A ye bhi Syedi Emaaduddin si ilm hasil kidu che.
  • Aap Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A na zaman ma vafat thaya. Aap ni umar 71 varas ni hati.
  • Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A ye aap ne Syedna Zainuddin R.A na jivar ma dafan kida. Qabr ma Syedna AbdulQadir Najmuddin R.A, Aap khud utra hata, ane famava laga ke mane mara bavaji saheb ni lahad chumvanu sharaf thayu.

  • Yemen ma aap Syedna Yusuf Najmuddin [r.a.] ni khidmat ma rahya. Te baad aap Hind tashreef laya.
  • Aap no 24 varas no zaman, saadat no hato. Hind ma Mumineen ni 140 bilaad ma 10,000 si vadhare vasti hati.
  • Ahmedabad maj Mumineen na 28 Mohalla, 22 Masjid, 1000 makan ane 200 Shops hati, ane Approx. 5000 Mumineen ni vasti hati. Ahmedabad Sarangpur ma Masjid aap ye banavi.
  • Dawat na arsh par mustavi thaya baad, aap ye ghana bilad ma safar kidi. Deen na aalam ne baland kida. Saadat aam thai. Sindh na bilad ma Dawat qayam thai. Yemen ma bhi aap ne fateh azeem mili. Yemen ma je kitabo no ek mohto khazano lutai gayo hato, te vapas milo. "Hayya alaa khairul amal" ni nida zaher ma karva ma aavti. Idd-e-Gadeer-ul-Khum ni majlis thaati.
  • Aap na zaman na shuru ma Gujarat na suba Mirjahan Kokeh ye ghano zulam kido. Aap makhfi thaya. Te baad suba Khan Khanan na hath par amaan milu.
  • Aap na zaman ma Mohammed bin Taher Nehervali ni fitnat thai. Te ye Imam Mehdi hovano daavo kido. Fitnat na sabab aap ne Ahmedabad ma rehvu mushkil thayu. Aap Kapadvanj padhari gaya.
  • 27 Rabiul Akhar, 999 H. 69 varas ni umare aap Ahmedabad ma vafat thaya.
  • Kapadvanj ma Aap na be Shahzadi, Manek Baisaheba, ane Ajabbu Baisaheba ni Qabr chhe. Beve qabr paalkhi ma chhe. Qabrastan ma dakhal thata samnej qabaro na vachma aa palkhi chhe. vahan na mujavar aa quboor batavi sakse.

Te waqt Mulla Wahed Bhaisaheb na ghar ma Weaving loom na niche aap moula ye aaram farmavelo. Navlakhi no inkar ehni barbadi no sabab bano, jivare Mulla Wahedsaab ni khidmat aap ne keva daraja par lai gai?

name: Urus Syedna Lamak bin Malik (RA)
html:
• Syedna Lamak bin Maalik,1, ane taqeeyat ma rehta hata.
  • Imam Mustansir Billah r.a. ye aap ne Yemen ma Qazi ul Quzaat na a'ala mansab ma qayam kida.
  • Syedna Lamak r.a. ye teen Aimmat [ 18-19-20] ni khidmat nu sharaf hasil kidu. Aap ye Dawatul Haq ni khidmat ma ghani jafeshani kidi. Syedna Hatim bin Syedna Ibrahim r.a. ye aap ni khidmat ni zikar ghani tafseel [ details] si kidi chhe.
  • Imam Mustansir Billah A.S na Zaman ma Yemen ma Hakim bin Abi Javhar ye Mumineen par ghana zulm kida. Mumineen ne qaid ma nakhi dida, ehma Syedna Lamak bin Maalik r.a. bhi hata. Syedna Ali bin Mohammed Sulehi r.a. ye Imam Mustansir Billah a.s. ni raza ane doa si Masar, Lehab, ane Hisne Hamzat ne fateh kida, ane Syedna Lamak r.a. ne qaid ma si chhuraya, ane aap ni qabeliyat ane jafeshani ni qadar kari, kitnak siyasi [ political] umur [tasks] aap ne sonpa.
  • Syedna Ali r.a. ye Syedna Lamak r.a. ne Imam Mustansir a.s. ni hajrat ma mokla. Imam a.s. ye aap ne Syedna Moayyed Shirazi r.a. na ghar ma utaaro aapo, ane Syedna Moayyed r.a. si ilm parhva no amar framayo. Aap 5 saal Misr ma rahi ilm hasil karta rahya.
  • Syedna Lamak r.a. ye Syedna Moayyed Shirazi r.a. na irshad mutabiq ulum na fuuz hasil kida. Yej misal Dawatul Haq ni rusum, Imami majlis ni aadaab, azmat ane safaf ne samjha.  5 saal na arsa ma aap ye je dekhu ane sunu, teno zakhiro [ collect] kido, je ulum na asrar [ secrets] hata, te haasil kida. Aap ye 27 sawal arz kida, to Syedna Moayyed Shirazi r.a ye farmayu ke aa sawaal na javab Imam a.s. si haasil kariye. Imam a.s. ye har sawal na javab aapa ane har javab ma Syedna Lamak r.a. ne ek qamis tashreef ma aapta.
  • Aap na haath par Hind si aavela Moulai Abdullah a.q. ane Moulai Nooruddin a.q. taiyar thaya chhe.
  • Aap ye imam a.s. ni raza si aap na shahzada Syedna Yahya r.a. ne aap na baad qayam kida.
  • 20ma Imam ,Imam Aamir a.s. na Zaman ma aap vafat thaya. 510 H.

name: Urus Moulatena Hurratul Maleka (RA)
html:
• Moulatena Hurratul Maleka Saheba r.a. nu naam mubarak Maulatena Arwa binte Ahmed bin Mohammed bin Qasim Sulehi chhe.
  • Aap ni viladat 440 H. ma thai. Aap ni tarbiyat aap na kaki Maulatena Asma binte Shehab ye kidi. Ahle Yemen aap ne 'Bilquis e Sugra' si yaad kare chhe, kem ke aap fehmo aqal ane husnut tadbeer ma be-misaal tha. Aap na aawaz ma qudrati kashish hati. Aap qiraat [ speech ] ghani behtar parhta. Aap Katebah [ authoress ] tha. Akhbar ane tawarikh aap ne ghani yaad thi. Tanzil, Taawil ane ilme Hadees ma aap maher [expert] tha.
  • Aap ni shaadi Syedna Ali bin Mohammed Sulehi na Shahzada, Dai Syedna Ahmed Mukarram r.a. na saath 461 H. ma thai. Aap ne char farzand hata. Mohammed, Ali, Fatema ane Umme Hamdan. 484 H ma Syedna Ahmed na Vafat na baad aap Yemen na Maleka thaya, ane 484 si 532 tak Maleka rahya.
  • Aap Doat ne parda na pichhe si Sabaq parhavta. Ilm, Fazal, parhezgari, zohad ane ibadat na saath aap ni siyasat ma husn ane tadbeer ma latafat ehvi thi ke Khaso-aam saghla na dilo mohabbat si jiti lida.
  • Aap ye Imam Mustansir Billah [a.s.] na Zaman si Imam Taiyeb [a.s.] lag char [4] Aimmat Tahireen [a.s.] na Zaman ma Dawat qayam kidi. Ilm ne nashar kidu. Syedna Lamak [r.a.] ane Syedna Yahya [r.a.] ye Ilm nashar karva ma aap ni musaedat kidi. Yemen ma aap Imam Aamir [a.s.] na Hujjat tha. Imam Aamir [a.s.] ye aap ni taraf purana rumal mokla, ane Shahadat no ishaaro kido. 531 H. ma aap ye Imam Aamir [a.s.] ni hazrat ma javaheraat na hadiya mokla. Imam [a.s.] na farman si Doat Muttaqeen na silsila ne jaari kida.
  • 525 H. ma aap ye Sana'a ni Jame-Masjid no mashraqi [East] hisso ziyada kido, ane Deewar par Panjatan Paak [s.a.] ane aap na Zaman lag na Aimmat na naam mubarak "Kufi" khat [ letters ] ma likha je Mehfooz rahya, ane Dail-ajal Al Hayyul Muqaddas Syedna Mohammed Burhanuddin Aqa (RA) ye voh naam 1402 H. ma tehqeeq farmavi mojeza si jaher kida.
  • 22 Shabanul Karim 532 H. ma Moulatena Hurratul Maleka (r.a.) ye Imam Aamir (a.s.) ni raza mubarak si aap na matha par nas no taj pehnayo.
  • 22 Shabanul Karim 532 H. [1140 A.D.] Zi Jiblah [Yemen ] ma aap 96 varas ni umare vafat thaya. Zi Jiblah ni Masjid na javar ma aap ni qabr chhe. Aap na vafat na baad ghana moajiz jaher thaya. Dushmano ye aap ni qabr ni jagah babat eteraz [objection] kido. Qabr mubarak khodwa ma aavi. Ehma si dastavez nikla ke qabr ni jagah Masjid si alag chhe. Aap ni Zarih Mubarak ne tori nakhi, je 1414 H. ma Syedna Mohammed Burhanuddin R.A ye dubara taamir farmavi chhe.

name: Urus Syedi Abdul Qadir Hakimuddin (AQ)
html:
• Syedi Abdul Qadar Hakimuddin [a.q.] Syedi Bawa mulla khan a.q. na farznde arjumnd chhe.
  • Aap ye paanch Doat ni khidmat kidi chhe. Aap 38ma Dai, Syedna Ismail Badruddin (Sani } r.a. [Jamanagr] na Mazoon tha.
  • Doat Kiram ane Hudud ni shaan ma aap ye Arabic ma qasida tasneef farmaya chhe. aaj bhi har doat na urs ni majalis ma aa qasida parhay chhe. Khidmat ni jaza ye mili ke, aap ni nasal ma Doat Kiram ane Hudud thaya.
  • Aap Hafizul Quran hata. Har mumin aap na Ilm, taqwa, riyazat ane fidai ni shaan jaane chhe.
  • Koi waqt aap ni Namaz fot nathi thai. Har Jumoa ni raate mohalla ni masjid ma padharta. Je namaz ma hazir na thaay, tene taqid karta ane garamat ( fine) leta.
  • Deen ni rasamo ne aap ye zinda kidi. Roj savare Quran Majid na daur ni rasam ane Sabil ni rasam aap ye shuru kidi chhe.
  • Nisfil Lail ni Namaz na baad aap kitabo likhta. Dawat na kitabo na be khazana aap ye likha. Ek Syedna Ismail Badruddin [r.a.] ni hazrat ma arz kida, ane bija pote parhavva vaste rakhta.
  • Aap ni sakhavat ni ye shaan hati ke rupiya ni theli je aap rakhta, te ma si saail ne muththi bhari ne aapi deta, ke puri theli aapi deta.
  • Aap ye aap ni vasiyat ma aap ni tamam milkat na malik Daiz-zaman ne kida.
  • Aap na mojeza be shumaar chhe. Aap na dafan na 21 din na baad Dushmano ye aap ni qabr ne khodavi; aap sahi salaam nikla, Dushmano na hath bhoy ma para.
  • Aap Qaziye Hajat chhe. Mumineen aap ni paase har hajat tamam kare chhe.
  • Aap na farzand Syedi Dawoodbhai, Syedna Moayyed [r.a.] na Mazoon hata.
  • 5 Shawwal 1142 H. aap Burhanpur ma vafat thaya. aap na baad aap ni qabr par zulm thayo hato. urs 27 shawwal bhi manay chhe.
  • Burhanpur mazar complex ek namunedar tameer chhe.

je aaj bhi Sidhpur ma maujud chhe.
  • Te baad aap Yemen padhara. Vahan dushmano no jor ghano hato. Aap Zabid ma makhfi halat ma rahya. Aap na dushmano ye aap ne ghani taklif pohnchavi chhe. Aap ne Roman Badshah ye qaid kida. 7000 Ibrahimi ni zamanat par aap ne riha kida. Ye raqam Miyan Ahmed bin Ajabshah [Madfoon-Ahmedabad] ye potana vepar na maal si adaa kidi.
  • Aap ye te baad Aqamatul Meqaab no quilo [fort] fateh kido. Aaj bhi vahan aap ni nishani maujud chhe.
  • Te baad aap Ziyyah ma rahya. Masaar ma rahya
column27:
ane akhir ma Taybah padhara. Vahan si aap ye Hind ni taraf Syedna Jalal Shamshuddin [r.a.] par nas pohnchavi. Aap Taybah ma 16 Zilhaj 974 H. vafat thaya.
  • Taybah ma aap na bhai Moosa Bhai Saheb ni qabr chhe. Vahan Syedi Nooh bin Bharuchi ni Masjid chhe. Ek vav bhi chhe. Taybah
column28: Sana'a si 50 Km. duur chhe. Rasto ghano kharab chhe."
